content.text: 0) Combine the sour cream, mayonnaise, cottage cheese, salsa, cayenne pepper, lemon juice and yogurt in a blender and puree until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "mayonnaise"@27:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cottage cheese"@39:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salsa"@55:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cayenne pepper"@62:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "lemon juice"@78:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "yogurt"@94:100 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the sour cream"@11:25 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a blender"@104:113 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "puree"@118:123 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until smooth"@124:136 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
